metadata.name: Run PowerShell Script from Redirected Input Stream
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell script execution via input stream redirect

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\s-\\s*<')

output.summary: Detects PowerShell script execution via input stream redirect
